actions.name: Vacuous Core

cost.trigger: The user declares Glaciate, Freeze Shock, or Ice Burn.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user declares Glaciate, Freeze Shock, or Ice Burn.
Effect: The triggering attack inflicts @Affliction[frozen] 5 on all valid targets on hit. If the triggering attack was Freeze Shock or Ice Burn, the attack causes all valid targets to lose -1 ACC stage for 5 Activations.

actions.name: Vacuous Core
actions.description: Passive: if the user is White Kyurem, they gain the Turboblaze Ability as an Extra Ability. If the user is Black Kyurem, they gain the Teravolt Ability as an Extra Ability.

system.description:
Trigger: The user declares Glaciate, Freeze Shock, or Ice Burn.
Effect: The triggering attack inflicts @Affliction[frozen] 5 on all valid targets on hit. If the triggering attack was Freeze Shock or Ice Burn, the attack causes all valid targets to lose -1 ACC stage for 5 Activations. Passive: if the user is White Kyurem, they gain the Turboblaze Ability as an Extra Ability. If the user is Black Kyurem, they gain the Teravolt Ability as an Extra Ability.
